
# Project Title

Food Ordering App is a sleek and user-friendly mobile application built with Flutter, designed to provide a seamless food ordering experience. Users can explore a diverse range of food categories, including pizza, burgers, salads, and ice cream, and place orders effortlessly.

The app is powered by Firebase Firestore, ensuring real-time data retrieval and secure storage, enabling smooth transaction processing and up-to-date menu listings.


## Features

- User Authentication – Secure sign-in and registration.

- Food Browsing – Smooth navigation through food categories.
- Shopping Cart – Add, remove, and manage items easily.
- Order Placement – Seamless checkout and confirmation.
- Order Placement – Seamless checkout and confirmation.
- User Profile – Personal details, order history, and preferences.
- Real-Time Updates – Live notifications for order status.
- Greeting Messages – Engaging UI messages for better user experience.
- Category Selection – Organized food categories for quick filtering.
- Food Item List – Detailed menus with images and prices.
- Order Screen & Food Cart – Clear layout for tracking orders.
- Checkout Button – Simplified payment and confirmation system.

## Installation

Install my-project with npm

```bash
 Copy code
git clone https://github.com/007AnupamSharma/Food_Ordering_App.git
cd Food_Ordering_App
Install dependencies:

```
```bash
Copy code
flutter pub get
Set up Firebase:
```
- Add your google-services.json file for Android in the android/app directory.
- Add your GoogleService-Info.plist file for iOS in the ios/Runner directory.

- Run the app:
```bash
flutter run
```
